name: Project HEX
description:
Fight in the past and future to free humanity from the menace of the HEX AI!

In this game you will fight a endless horde of robots trying to wipe out humanity. Take control of two experienced soldiers from different times, working together to put a stop to the ultimate threat, the HEX AI.

This is my second game we've ever made, all the art done by my classmate. It was produced for our project during the second semester of our Game Design classes in college. It's in a rough state due to our lack of experience, but it will be available for anyone interested in trying it out.
